channel.title: Roonscape - Bringing back Runescape 2006
channel.description:
Alright so I also posted this on R-S my name there is Roonking, just to let you know. [center][img]http://i56.tinypic.com/8wwsom.png[/img][/center] [b]Base:[/b] Hyperion [b]Client:[/b] 317 Deob [b]Blog:[/b] [url=http://roonscape-06-07.tumblr.com/][i][u]Click Here[/u][/i][/url] [b]Roonscape developers:[/b]
[b]Server:[/b] Roonking Vox` [b]Website:[/b] Fffrunegod
[b]Main goal:[/b] Back in 06 & 07 there where great time's!Those time's many of you just won't forget, so do I. This project will have everything based on these times. This also does mean; NO GODSWORDS / NO NEWER MAPS / NO NEWER NPCS. [b]Current Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Clipped Following[/li] [li]Npc clipping fixed even in Combat![/li] [li]Deposit box, working perfectly.[/li] [li]Shopping system.[/li] [li]Prayer system[/li] [li]Basic combat system, will be updated soon enough.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i49.photobucket.com/albums/f291/pkk_04/RS06-1.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2kow8g.png[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/qy5sht.png[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2bacyg.png[/img] [img]http://i49.photobucket.com/albums/f291/pkk_04/anvilsmith.png[/img] [img]http://i49.photobucket.com/albums/f291/pkk_04/smithing.png[/img] Thank you for reading, please check our blog delay!

item.title: Roonscape - Bringing back Runescape 2006
item.dc:creator: @Creazy_pk3r Creazy pk3r
item.description:
@Creazy_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:45, topic:398067”][quote author=Creazy pk3r link=topic=495198.msg3626889#msg3626889 date=1307903017]

Do you have any idea of a release date for this to be hosted?

As soon we finish most server sided.

Obtw, thanks for the spam on my thread lol!

Yeah I know that but do you have an estimation on when that might happen?

I have discussed this question with Vox, he says “By the end of the summer”. This could also be moving, but we will let you know that!
[/quote]
Holy crap…[/quote]

Sad story right , I’ll talk a other time with him to get that out of his MINDS!!!

Read full topic

I have discussed this question with Vox, he says “By the end of the summer”. This could also be moving, but we will let you know that![/quote]

item.title: Roonscape - Bringing back Runescape 2006
item.dc:creator: @Creazy_pk3r Creazy pk3r
item.description:
@Creazy_pk3r wrote:

[quote=“Jrekko, post:43, topic:398067”]I just posted on another one of the “RuneScape Remake” threads and I must say, I like this one a whole lot more. I love your game frame and it looks like your making good progress. If you drop this project, please give it to me and I’ll keep it going

Good luck.[/quote]

I would If drop it , but the point is I won’t drop it !

Read full topic

item.title: Roonscape - Bringing back Runescape 2006
item.dc:creator: @Jrekko Jrekko
item.description:
@Jrekko wrote:

I just posted on another one of the “RuneScape Remake” threads and I must say, I like this one a whole lot more. I love your game frame and it looks like your making good progress. If you drop this project, please give it to me and I’ll keep it going

Good luck.

item.title: Roonscape - Bringing back Runescape 2006
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:24, topic:398067”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=495198.msg3625940#msg3625940 date=1307832629]

Guys instead of asking for the images and crap just rip it from his site stop trying to beg for something you can rip…

I hope you’re not talking to Brian, because our website was the best 2007 website ever made, aside from the real RuneScape one of course. Why would we need to ask for those images when I already made/found them all?
[/quote]im just saying that people are always asking or the files to the pages when they are easy to rip:o

That’s the sad part. xP Spend all this time tracking down and remaking everything then someone just goes and steals it. Kinda lame imo. Oh well, that’s when you sink their website. :)[/quote]True that, haha…or when you release a server, a very popular server swaps over to your source after you release it…and you just happen to have made a cheat client for your server xD

Read full topic
